channel.title: (No subject)NEED HELP ASAP(No subject)
channel.description:
[code]Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.NullPointerException at ServerGUI.addConsole(ServerGUI.java:66) at ServerGUI.printlnTag(ServerGUI.java:304) at misc.println(misc.java:52) at server.run(server.java:123) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]
How do I fix that :( ?
Thanks in Advance

item.title: (No subject)NEED HELP ASAP(No subject)
item.dc:creator: @LeScape_Pk LeScape Pk
item.description:
@LeScape_Pk wrote:

z0mg…looking at it closer i’ve seen that before, did it immediately crash the server? (i know the answer is yes, but if it isnt then idk, if it is, then this is the solution): friends\ignore list causes that error, i know from experience, go into characters folder (yes this is tedious) and check every player for friends\ignore lists, delete everyones friend\ignore list, then go into client.java and put on your welcome message (if you dont know how to do that part, ill help) to not add to friends\ignore list, problem solved

Read full topic
